comments:
I got the following NPE during a "Refresh Branches and Verions" The error was 
either caused by a bad state or resulted in a bad state such that trying to 
expand HEAD in the repo failed with the same exception. Restarting Eclipse 
fixed the problem. I have not been able to reproduce this.
